name: SHOOTERHOUSE
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING AND STROBING EFFECTS

I'm very proud of this extremely silly game! I'm a huge Splatterhouse fan, and for Halloween 2012 I decided to put together a kusoge/bakage shmup in a week themed around it. This has ridiculous music by Sampling Masters and myself, a couple of the funniest powerups I've ever thought of, and a ton of super fun graphical effects, including a super scaler-esque final boss encounter. I even produced a few hard copies to give out on Halloween!
